togglePause() - Method in class game.core.GameWorld
Toggles the game's pause state.

Since Game.togglePause() is not static, it can be accessed through 'Game.gameWorld.togglePause()'.
togglePause() - Method in class game.Game
Toggles the game pause state.
Pauses the game if it is running, and resumes the game if it is paused.
Handles all necessary timers and interfaces.
